Class RegularMember

java.lang.Object
GymMember
RegularMember
public class RegularMember extends GymMember
Class of a Regular Member of the gym. Extends the abstract class GymMember and contains additional attributes and methods.
Author:
Sadikshya Karki

    • RegularMember

      public RegularMember(int id, String name, String location, String phone, String email, String gender, String DOB, String membershipStartDate, String referralSource)
      Constructor to initialize regular member details.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the gym member
      name - Name of the gym member
      location - Location of the gym member
      phone - Phone number of the gym member
      email - Email address of the gym member
      gender - Gender of the gym member
      DOB - Date of birth of the gym member
      membershipStartDate - Membership start date of the gym member
      referralSource - Source From which the gym member was referred

      Method to get the price of a plan based on its name.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      Price of the plan(if valid) or -1 (if invalid)
